ygData.subject: Gnomestock
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I had fun.  heh but I didn t see any fireworks display!  :(  Well maybe there was a display, but I blinked and missed it.  :) At the next one we should
ygData.messageBody:
Well I had fun. heh but I didn't see any fireworks display! :( Well maybe
there was a display, but I blinked and missed it. :)

At the next one we should all get levitate and go to the top of the
windmills! :) I did that once before, it was pretty fun. Would be quite a
sight to see 40 gnomes all crowded on the roofs of the windmills. heh you
can see pictures of me on the roofs at http://www.juju.org/photos/everquest/

Also next time we should try and get the news sites like stratics to post a
message on the news page about it so we can get even more people to come.
Though I've never seen that many people in the akanon zone at one time. heh

- the ORIGINAL Ubershadow Leprechaun - Gnome Rogue - Erollisi Marr (ignore
that guy that stole my name on Solusek Ro grr)

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld
